sentences.sContent: Depression in the twilight years (= the last years of your life ) is usually related to illness.
sentences.sCn: 晚年的精神抑郁通常与疾病有关。

synos.tran: 黎明，黄昏；薄暮；衰退期；朦胧状态

phrases.pCn: n. 城市贫穷地区；界限分明的两者之间的模糊状态

trans.tranCn: 黎明，黄昏；薄暮；衰退期；朦胧状态
黄昏；薄暮；衰退期；朦胧状态
trans.tranOther: the small amount of light in the sky as the day ends
